doc.field: Carl, Judy, Debby, Deirdre, and Kristen - photo made by CN Tower. Brian, Naomi, Carl, Debby, and I drove from our timeshare in Barrie, Ontario to downtown Toronto, parked the car in a garage (tight squeeze), and walked to the Royal Ontario Museum. Next we took the subway to Queen Street and a street car to Eaton Centre. Brian and Naomi went back to the car to get Deirdre and Kristen at the airport, while Carl, Debby, and I took the subway to Union Station and walked to the CN Tower. We rode the elevator to the first observation tower and looked out over the city and Lake Ontario.
toronto ontario canada cntower carl groupphoto ontariotrip
CN Tower Group Picture: Carl, Judy, Debby, Deirdre, Kristen

Brian, Naomi, Carl, Debby, and I drove from our timeshare in Barrie, Ontario to downtown Toronto, parked the car in a garage (tight squeeze), and walked to the Royal Ontario Museum. Next we took the subway to Queen Street and a street car to Eaton Centre. Brian and Naomi went back to the car to get Deirdre and Kristen at the airport, while Carl, Debby, and I took the subway to Union Station and walked to the CN Tower.
CN Tower - downtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Brian, Naomi, Carl, Debby, and I drove from our timeshare in Barrie, Ontario to downtown Toronto, parked the car in a garage (tight squeeze), and walked to the Royal Ontario Museum. Next we took the subway to Queen Street and a street car to Eaton Centre. Brian and Naomi went back to the car to get Deirdre and Kristen at the airport, while Carl, Debby, and I took the subway to Union Station and walked to the CN Tower. We rode the elevator to the first observation tower and looked out over the city and Lake Ontario. Located at a height of 342 m (1,122 ft) you will find the Glass Floor and Outdoor Observation Deck.
toronto ontario canada cntower observationlevel ontariotrip
